ai-tha-ap221:1.4_0: I went to the house of that house.
ai-tha-ap221:2.1_0: When it’s found, a great hero,
ai-tha-ap221:3.3_0: I paid homage at the teacher’s feet,
ai-tha-ap221:3.4_0: But when I did in the past.
ai-tha-ap221:4.3_0: The wise never flew the light,
ai-tha-ap221:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap221:6.1_0: These seven eons of the eon
ai-tha-ap221:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap221:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable ghee.
ai-tha-ap221:9.1_0: The ninth senior monk with the spears.
